product_name: The North Face Cool Horizon T-Shirt - Women's
long_description: Hot days ahead? Get the women's lightweight Cool Horizon T-Shirt from The North Face. It has special fabric technology that keeps you cool and comfortable all day long. Luxurious, soft fabric is a blend of Tencel(R) lyocell and polyester stretch cooling knit. Dynamic cooling technology with VaporWick(R) wicks moisture and dries fast to aid cooling. UPF 15 sun protection. Women's Cool Horizon T-Shirt from The North Face stretches with you and holds its shape beautifully.
short_description: Hot days ahead? Get the women's lightweight Cool Horizon T-Shirt from The North Face. It has special fabric technology that keeps you cool and comfortable all day long.
